DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To determine whether high dose statin therapy patient aspirin mono antiplatelet therapy receive drug-eluting stent ( DES ) previously free adverse cardiac event first 12 month could superior pravastatin therapy prevention late adverse cardiac cerebrovascular event additional 12 month . Study Design - Prospective , randomize , multi-center study 1000 subject enrol . - Eligible subject randomize 1:1 ) atorvastatin 40 mg ( n=1000 ) vs. b ) pravastatin 20 mg/day ( n=1000 ) . All subject follow 1 year randomization . Additional long-term follow-up ( 2- 3-year ) precede next plan 1-year study period . - Subjects coronary artery diseases meet inclusion exclusion criterion include Clinical laboratory follow-up performed .
